00045 /*
00046 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_SimpleAliasTable {
00047 
00048 public:
00049 
00050     EGS_SimpleAliasTable(int N, const EGS_Float *f);
00051 
00052     ~EGS_SimpleAliasTable();
00053 
00054     int sample(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) const {
00055         int bin = (int) (rndm->getUniform()*n);
00056         return rndm->getUniform() < wi[bin] ? bin : bins[bin];
00057     };
00058 
00059     int       n;          //!< number of subintervals
00060     EGS_Float *wi;        //!< array of bin branching probabilities
00061     unsigned short *bins; //!< bins
00062 
00063 };
00064 
00065 EGS_SimpleAliasTable::EGS_SimpleAliasTable(int N, const EGS_Float *f) : n(0) {
00066     if( N < 1 ) return;
00067     n = N;
00068     wi = new EGS_Float [n]; bins = new unsigned short [n]; int i;
00069     double sum = 0; double *fcum = new double [n];
00070     for(i=0; i<n; ++i) { fcum[i] = f[i]; sum += fcum[i]; bins[i] = n+1; }
00071     sum /= n; int jh, jl;
00072     for(i=0; i<n-1; ++i) {
00073         for(jh=0; jh<n-1; jh++) {
00074             if( bins[jh] > n && fcum[jh] > sum ) break;
00075         }
00076         for(jl=0; jl<n-1; jl++) {
00077             if( bins[jl] > n && fcum[jl] < sum ) break;
00078         }
00079         double aux = sum - fcum[jl];
00080         fcum[jh] -= aux;
00081         wi[jl] = fcum[jl]/sum; bins[jl] = jh;
00082     }
00083     for(i=0; i<n; ++i) {
00084         if( bins[i] > n ) { bins[i] = i; wi[i] = 1; }
00085         //egsInformation("alias table: %d %d %g\n",i,bins[i],wi[i]);
00086     }
00087     delete [] fcum;
00088 }
00089 
00090 EGS_SimpleAliasTable::~EGS_SimpleAliasTable() {
00091     if( n > 0 ) { delete [] wi; delete [] bins; }
00092 }
00093 */
00094 
00095 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_ShellData {
00096 
00097 public:
00098 
00099     float           be;          
00100     unsigned short  type;        
00101     unsigned short  ntrans;      
00102     unsigned short *ttypes;      
00103     EGS_SimpleAliasTable *table; 
00104 
00105     EGS_ShellData() : ntrans(0), table(0) {};
00106     ~EGS_ShellData() { deleteData(); }
00107 
00108     void deleteData() {
00109         if( ntrans > 0 ) { delete [] ttypes; ntrans = 0; }
00110         if( table ) { delete table; table = 0; }
00111     };
00112 
00113     bool loadData(istream &data);
00114 
00115     int sample(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) const {
00116         return ttypes[table->sample(rndm)];
00117     };
00118 
00119 };
00120 
00121 bool EGS_ShellData::loadData(istream &data) {
00122     deleteData();
00123     char t; data.read((char *)&t,sizeof(char)); type = t;
00124     data.read((char *)&ntrans,sizeof(short));
00125     data.read((char *)&be,sizeof(float));
00126     //egsInformation("shell is of type %d, has BE=%g and %d transitions\n",type,be,ntrans);
00127     if( data.fail() || ntrans > 10000 ) {
00128         ntrans = 0; return false;
00129     }
00130     if( ntrans == 0 ) return true;
00131     ttypes = new unsigned short [ntrans];
00132     EGS_Float *tmp = new EGS_Float [ntrans]; float aux;
00133     for(int i=0; i<ntrans; ++i) {
00134         data.read((char *)&ttypes[i],sizeof(unsigned short));
00135         data.read((char *)&aux,sizeof(float)); tmp[i] = aux;
00136         //egsInformation("got transition %d with p=%g\n",ttypes[i],aux);
00137     }
00138     if( data.fail() ) {
00139         delete [] tmp; deleteData(); return false;
00140     }
00141     table = new EGS_SimpleAliasTable(ntrans,tmp);
00142     delete [] tmp;
00143     return true;
00144 }

00146 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_ElementRelaxData {
00147 
00148 public:
00149 
00150     EGS_ElementRelaxData() : Z(0), nshell(0), shells(0) {};
00151 
00152     ~EGS_ElementRelaxData() { deleteData(); };
00153 
00154     int loadData(int iZ, istream &data);
00155 
00156 
00157     unsigned short       Z;          
00158     unsigned short       nshell;     
00159     EGS_ShellData       *shells;     
00160 
00161     void deleteData() {
00162         if( nshell > 0 ) delete [] shells;
00163         Z = 0; nshell = 0; shells = 0;
00164     };
00165 
00166 };
00167 
00168 int EGS_ElementRelaxData::loadData(int iZ, istream &data) {
00169     if( iZ == Z ) return 0;
00170     deleteData();
00171     Z = iZ;
00172     int pos = 2 + (Z-1)*sizeof(int);
00173     data.seekg(pos,ios::beg);
00174     data.read((char *)&pos,sizeof(int));
00175     if( data.fail() ) {
00176         egsWarning("Failed reading position for element %d\n",Z);
00177         Z = 0; return 5;
00178     }
00179     data.seekg(pos,ios::beg);
00180     data.read((char *)&nshell,sizeof(nshell));
00181     if( data.fail() || nshell < 1 || nshell > 63 ) {
00182         egsWarning("Failed reading number of shells for Z=%d (got %d shells and fail()=%d\n",
00183                 Z,nshell,data.fail()); nshell = 0; return 6;
00184     }
00185     //egsInformation("element %d has %d shells\n",Z,nshell);
00186     shells = new EGS_ShellData [nshell];
00187     for(int j=0; j<nshell; ++j) {
00188         if( !shells[j].loadData(data) ) {
00189             egsWarning("Failed loading data for shell %d of element %d\n",j+1,Z);
00190             deleteData(); return 7;
00191         }
00192     }
00193     return 0;
00194 }
00195 
00196 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_RelaxImplementation {
00197 
00198 public:
00199 
00200     EGS_RelaxImplementation(const char *data_path) : elements(0), nz(0) {
00201         data_file = egsJoinPath(data_path,"relax.data");
00202     };
00203 
00204     ~EGS_RelaxImplementation() {
00205         if( nz > 0 ) {
00206             for(int j=0; j<nz; ++j) {
00207                 if( elements[j] ) delete elements[j];
00208             }
00209             delete [] elements;
00210         }
00211     };
00212 
00213     int loadData(int Z);
00214     int loadData(int Z, istream &data);
00215     int loadData(int Nz, const int *Zarray);
00216     int loadAllData();
00217 
00218     int openDataFile(istream **data);
00219 
00220     void checkData(int Z, int shell) {
00221         static const char *func_name = "checkData";
00222         if( !elements )
00223             if( loadData(Z) ) egsFatal("%s: failed to load data for Z=%d\n",
00224                     func_name,Z);
00225         if( Z < 1 || Z > nz )
00226             egsFatal("%s: Z=%d is outside of initialized range 1...%d\n",
00227                     func_name,Z,nz);
00228         if( shell < 0 || shell >= elements[Z-1]->nshell )
00229             egsFatal("%s: element %d has %d shells but you are asking for "
00230                 "shell %d\n",func_name,Z,elements[Z-1]->nshell,shell);
00231     };
00232 
00233     void relax(int Z, int sh, EGS_Float ecut, EGS_Float pcut,
00234             EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm, double &edep,
00235             EGS_SimpleContainer<EGS_RelaxationParticle> &particles) {
00236         checkData(Z,sh);
00237         EGS_Float minE = pcut < ecut ? pcut : ecut;
00238         relax(Z,sh,minE,ecut,pcut,rndm,edep,particles);
00239     };
00240 
00241     EGS_Float bindingEnergy(int Z, int shell) {
00242         checkData(Z,shell);
00243         return elements[Z-1]->shells[shell].be;
00244     };
00245 
00246     void setBindingEnergy(int Z, int shell, EGS_Float new_be) {
00247         checkData(Z,shell);
00248         elements[Z-1]->shells[shell].be = new_be;
00249     };
00250 
00251     EGS_Float getMaxGammaEnergy(int Z, int shell) {
00252         checkData(Z,shell);
00253         int ntrans = elements[Z-1]->shells[shell].ntrans;
00254         if( ntrans < 1 ) return 0;
00255         EGS_Float E = elements[Z-1]->shells[shell].be;
00256         EGS_Float emax = 0;
00257         for(int j=0; j<ntrans; ++j) {
00258             int transition = elements[Z-1]->shells[shell].ttypes[j];
00259             if( transition < 64 ) {
00260                 EGS_Float Egamma = E - elements[Z-1]->shells[transition].be;
00261                 if( Egamma > emax ) emax = Egamma;
00262             }
00263         }
00264         return emax;
00265     };
00266 
00267     EGS_Float getMaxElectronEnergy(int Z, int shell) {
00268         checkData(Z,shell);
00269         int ntrans = elements[Z-1]->shells[shell].ntrans;
00270         if( ntrans < 1 ) return 0;
00271         EGS_Float E = elements[Z-1]->shells[shell].be;
00272         EGS_Float emax = 0;
00273         for(int j=0; j<ntrans; ++j) {
00274             int transition = elements[Z-1]->shells[shell].ttypes[j];
00275             if( transition >= 64 ) {
00276                 int sh1 = (transition >> 6); int sh2 = transition - (sh1 << 6);
00277                 EGS_Float Eelec = E - (elements[Z-1]->shells[sh1].be +
00278                                        elements[Z-1]->shells[sh2].be);
00279                 if( Eelec > emax ) emax = Eelec;
00280             }
00281         }
00282         return emax;
00283     };
00284 
00285     void relax(int Z, int sh, EGS_Float minE, EGS_Float ecut, EGS_Float pcut,
00286             EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm, double &edep,
00287             EGS_SimpleContainer<EGS_RelaxationParticle> &particles) {
00288         EGS_Float E = elements[Z-1]->shells[sh].be;
00289         //egsInformation("relax(%d,%d): E=%g minE=%g\n",Z,sh,E,minE);
00290         if( E <= minE || elements[Z-1]->shells[sh].ntrans < 1 ) {
00291             //egsInformation("relax: terminating\n");
00292             edep += E; return;
00293         }
00294         int transition = elements[Z-1]->shells[sh].sample(rndm);
00295         //egsInformation("relax: got transition %d\n",transition);
00296         if( transition < 64 ) {
00297             EGS_Float Egamma = E - elements[Z-1]->shells[transition].be;
00298             //egsInformation("->flourescence, Egamma=%g\n",Egamma);
00299             if( Egamma > pcut ) {
00300                 EGS_RelaxationParticle p(0,Egamma);
00301                 particles.add(p);
00302             }
00303             else edep += Egamma;
00304             relax(Z,transition,minE,ecut,pcut,rndm,edep,particles);
00305         }
00306         else {
00307             int sh1 = (transition >> 6); int sh2 = transition - (sh1 << 6);
00308             EGS_Float Eelec = E - elements[Z-1]->shells[sh1].be - elements[Z-1]->shells[sh2].be;
00309             //egsInformation("->Auger, sh1=%d sh2=%d E=%g\n",sh1,sh2,Eelec);
00310             if( Eelec > ecut ) {
00311                 EGS_RelaxationParticle p(-1,Eelec);
00312                 particles.add(p);
00313             }
00314             else edep += Eelec;
00315             relax(Z,sh1,minE,ecut,pcut,rndm,edep,particles);
00316             relax(Z,sh2,minE,ecut,pcut,rndm,edep,particles);
00317         }
00318     };
00319 
00320     EGS_ElementRelaxData **elements;
00321     string               data_file;
00322     int                  nz;
00323 
00324 };
00325 
00326 int EGS_RelaxImplementation::openDataFile(istream **the_data) {
00327     static const char *func_name = "EGS_RelaxImplementation::openDataFile()";
00328     *the_data = 0;
00329     ifstream *data = new ifstream(data_file.c_str(),ios::binary);
00330     if( !(*data) ) {
00331         egsWarning("%s: failed to open data file %s\n",
00332                 func_name,data_file.c_str()); return 1;
00333     }
00334     short Nz; data->read((char *)&Nz,sizeof(short));
00335     if( data->fail() || Nz < 1 || Nz > 200 ) {
00336         egsWarning("%s: failed reading first record from %s\n",
00337                 func_name,data_file.c_str()); return 2;
00338     }
00339     if( Nz > nz ) {
00340         EGS_ElementRelaxData **new_elements = new EGS_ElementRelaxData* [Nz];
00341         if( nz > 0 ) {
00342             for(int j=0; j<nz; ++j) new_elements[j] = elements[j];
00343             delete [] elements;
00344         }
00345         else { for(int j=0; j<Nz; ++j) new_elements[j] = 0; }
00346         elements = new_elements;
00347         nz = Nz;
00348     }
00349     *the_data = data;
00350     return 0;
00351 }
00352 
00353 
00354 int EGS_RelaxImplementation::loadData(int Z) {
00355     static const char *func_name = "EGS_RelaxImplementation::loadData()";
00356     if( Z < 1 ) {
00357         egsWarning("%s: called with Z=%d?\n",func_name,Z);
00358         return 3;
00359     }
00360     istream *the_data;
00361     int res = openDataFile(&the_data);
00362     if( res || !the_data ) return res;
00363     istream &data = *the_data;
00364     if( Z > nz ) {
00365         egsWarning("%s: called with Z=%d, but I only have data for Z<=%d.\n",
00366                 func_name,Z,nz); return 4;
00367     }
00368     res = loadData(Z,data);
00369     delete the_data;
00370     return res;
00371 }
00372 
00373 int EGS_RelaxImplementation::loadData(int Z, istream &data) {
00374     if( elements[Z-1] ) return 0;
00375     elements[Z-1] = new EGS_ElementRelaxData;
00376     return elements[Z-1]->loadData(Z,data);
00377 }
00378 
00379 int EGS_RelaxImplementation::loadData(int Nz, const int *Zarray) {
00380     istream *the_data; int res = openDataFile(&the_data);
00381     if( res || !the_data ) return res;
00382     istream &data = *the_data;
00383     for(int j=0; j<Nz; ++j) {
00384         res = loadData(Zarray[j],data);
00385         if( res ) break;
00386     }
00387     delete the_data; return res;
00388 }
00389 
00390 int EGS_RelaxImplementation::loadAllData() {
00391     istream *the_data; int res = openDataFile(&the_data);
00392     if( res || !the_data ) return res;
00393     istream &data = *the_data;
00394     for(int Z=1; Z<=nz; ++Z) {
00395         res = loadData(Z,data);
00396         if( res ) break;
00397     }
00398     delete the_data; return res;
00399 }
00400 
00401 EGS_AtomicRelaxations::EGS_AtomicRelaxations(const char *data_path) {
00402     string path;
00403     if( !data_path ) {
00404         EGS_Application *app = EGS_Application::activeApplication();
00405         if( app )
00406             path = egsJoinPath(app->getHenHouse(),"data");
00407         else {
00408             char *hen_house = getenv("HEN_HOUSE");
00409             if( !hen_house ) {
00410                 egsWarning("EGS_AtomicRelaxations::EGS_AtomicRelaxations: "
00411                   "no active application and HEN_HOUSE not defined.\n"
00412                   "  assuming local directory for relax data\n");
00413                 path = "./";
00414             }
00415             else path = egsJoinPath(hen_house,"data");
00416         }
00417     } else path = data_path;
00418     p = new EGS_RelaxImplementation(path.c_str());
00419 }
00420 
00421 EGS_AtomicRelaxations::~EGS_AtomicRelaxations() { delete p; }
00422 
00423 int EGS_AtomicRelaxations::loadData(int Z) { return p->loadData(Z); }
00424 
00425 int EGS_AtomicRelaxations::loadData(int nz, const int *Zarray) {
00426     return p->loadData(nz,Zarray);
00427 }

00429 int EGS_AtomicRelaxations::loadAllData() {
00430     return p->loadAllData();
00431 }
